taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a domain model file in your project.

step.cmd: In the Project Explorer view pane, double-click the domain model file that you want to work with.
step.stepresult: The file and its elements are displayed in the Editor area.

step.cmd: In the Editor area, right-click the domain model file name (which is usually the first node) and select New Business Type .
Click the newly created business type.
Go to the Properties view pane, located below the Editor area, and complete the fields to edit the business type properties.
